mi::shader_v3::Edit_fb

mi::shader_v3::Edit_fb Class Reference

Framebuffer * operator-> () const
 reference the Framebuffer class, read-write access

Detailed Description

Smart pointer to access Framebuffer class for editing.

There resources are released automatically when Edit_fb goes out of scope.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
